short_summary: Procurement of 33x Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement to procureQty 33x Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine and ILS deliverables for delivery to Petawawa, Ontario.
full_summary:
================
# Government Contract Opportunity
================
### Title
* English: Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Passenger, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine
* French: Motoneige, deux passagers, moteur à 2 temps

### Contract Details
* Solicitation Number: W8476-236644/B
* Reference Number: PW-23-01028704
* Amendment Number: 1
* Amendment Date: 2023-03-08
* Tender Closing Date: 2023-04-20T14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: None

### Contract Description
The Department of National Defence is seeking to procure one (1) Sled, Self-Propelled, 2 Passenger, 2 Stroke Gasoline Engine and associated information and logistics support (ILS) deliverables for delivery to Petawawa, Ontario. 

The requested delivery date is 120 days after contract award. No security requirements are associated with this requirement. The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

The documents can be submitted in either official language of Canada. A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders/offerors/suppliers who submitted an offer on the previous solicitation.

### Contact Information
Genevieve Roach, genevieve.roach@forces.gc.ca

### Attachments
* [W8476-236644-B Original Bid Solicitation](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/03/fdfcad8e6b1b8e5ca3694f57feb3ef89/en_rfp_w8476-236644-b_original.pdf)
* [W8476-236644-B Amendment 001](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/08/a6eebdf74d1ea3d3505f31448e258552/en_rfp_w8476-236644-b_amendment_001.pdf)

### Documents
Please consult the attachments and contract description for complete details.
